name: User Story
about: Template for creating user stories
title: ''
labels: ''
assignees: ''

---

As a [role]
I need [feature]
So that [value add]

Assumptions and details:
[add details here]

Acceptance Criteria:

```gherkin
Given [precondition1]
And [precondition2]
When [event/action]
Then [expected outcome]
```
